entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -44.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 03:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -44.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -63
Dewpoint: -48.2°C
Wind: N 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 47.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 47. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 64 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill near minus 59. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
